OneLineDescription: Customizable Archery Physics for any load order. No mods required.
LongDescription: Archery physics the way you want, for any load order. Allows modifying the speed, gravity, impact force, noise level, and flags of projectiles, as well as removing auto-aim and fixing numerous bugs. (For example: The "Ninja Dodge" bug that has existed since launch, arrows colliding with the air in front of you, and more!) Comes with a complete settings menu that allows you to control everything. ( Github: https://github.com/radj307/Another-Archery-Patcher/ ) ( Nexus: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/53810 )
